DOC.brief_summary: The aim intervention : 1 . Assess feasibility effectiveness preconception health care initiate pediatric clinician outcome include woman 's access primary care contraceptive service ; contraception rapid repeat pregnancy rate interpregnancy interval ; woman 's immunization rate , control chronic illness , nutritional status , smoke substance use , mental health violence exposure ; child family health . 2 . Assess cost-effectiveness preconception health care initiate pediatric practice . The investigator evaluate outcome clinic base trial compare usual care preconception care intervention .
DOC.brief_title: Preconception Women 's Health Pediatric Practice Intervention
DOC.criteria: Mothers child age 0 12 month present child care participate pediatric office .
